data.actual_result: Animated emoji section doesn’t show up unless an animated emoji is uploaded
data.expected_result: Animated emoji section shows up when no animated emoji are uploaded
data.short_description: Animated emoji section is missing if there are no animated emoji (shows on desktop)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage emoji - Make sure you have no animated emoji uploaded - Scroll to the bottom of the emoji list and look for the animated emoji section - Optional: Observe the emoji list on a computer (the animated emoji section will show)
